Description: Mudstone (greywacke) palette carved in the form of a fish with elongated body, bifurcating tail fin, with incised and carved details of face, eyes, gills, mouth, scales and fins on both sides. Oval in cross-section.
Curator's comments: The rounded form and modelled details are not common in the predynastic, and the authenticity of this piece is in question.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Miss Alfreda T Hudd
